text: The Von Mackensen's have ruled the Grey Mountains for generations, their name revered throughout the entire pass. The Margraves that stem from this Noble family have held the Mountain Valley against numerous threats for decades. Expertly training the Fortress Garrison to operate both in siege warfare and in the rugged mountain climate. The garrison's elite proudly bears the Von Mackensen banner.
This has to be the worst rebellion I've ever seen..

Originally the Watch Captain of Ubersreik, X was drafted to serve as Captain Guard in the Fortress of Helmgart. X is a bear of a man unfased by the cold climate of the Grey Mountains and has faced all kinds of threats in the melting pot that is Ubersreik. His presence on the Fortress Walls inspire the brethren facing any foe daring enough to climb their final fate.

Passed on from Margrave to Margrave, Helmgart's Brand is the token worn by the Lord-Warden of the Grey Mountains. Forged by the Dwarfs of Karak Zorn it is enchanted with magical essence, hence why it's hilt always remains warm and pleasant to handle - regardless of the terrain the sword finds itself in. Making it easy for any wielder to fight regardless of the climate.
